course.subject: BMED
course.name: Technologies and World Health
course.description: The course provides an overview about the health problems facing the world today, and the current situations of developed and developing regions are compared and contrasted. The contribution of modern technologies, and frugal technologies in particular, to improve human health will be described. The elements of successful innovation will be explored in a broader context, such that in addition to technology product itself, the process of technology development, diffusion and implementation will be discussed. Students will develop a deeper understanding of the barriers for translating health care technology to application, including scientific, economic and cultural factors, and especially their impact in resource‐poor settings. Throughout the course, the concept of global village and global citizenship will be emphasized.

reviews.author: cwm
reviews.title: [好grade] 適合唔中意多考試, 又唔介意多濕碎野做嘅人
reviews.comment_content:
1. Class challenges and class activities (15%)
2. PRS (10%)
3. Homework (10%)
4. Class project (35%): including facebook postings, peer review, presentation, executive summary
5. Individual Final Exam (30%)
reviews.comment_teaching:
教得有D悶, 但係D class challenges同activities有D都幾得意
佢上堂有時都會叫人發表下自己意見, 通常都俾D international students答哂
reviews.comment_grading:
My grade: A- (完全無諗過有a range, 佢應該俾得幾鬆手)

- 基本上你content個度頭3樣都做足哂已經高分過唔少人, 有唔少人都係交少左一份homework, 走左幾堂, etc...
- Class project就一開始要mark定D groupmates, 見邊個睇落勁就問定佢一組先, 多數咁做最後都有唔錯嘅分數
- Final Exam (MC + Short Q), 佢其實有好多readings叫我地睇, 但我咩都無睇過, 只係溫lecture notes同homework(背答案咁溫orz), D問題都算易, 有一兩題要計數, 但記得佢lecture notes俾個D equations就ok
reviews.comment_workload:
佢呢個course煩就煩在有好多計得好少分嘅items, 睇下你中意midterm+final就算, 定係中意percentage分散D嘅course, 我認為自己考試通常都俾人屈, 所以呢個course exam d分計得少就好岩我
class challenges and activities個D, 其實係TA add哂D人入facebook group, professor得閒就上堂俾條問題大家, 一星期內要post自己嘅意見上去
Homework就每兩個星期就有一份要交, 佢一共俾6份你, 但你交左5份就已經拎哂10分, 雖然佢份功課睇落好多題, 但D答案其實輕鬆搵

reviews.author: testing
reviews.comment_content: Interesting Content, learnt quite a lot. Especailly like the interactive elements of the course which we were required to build something related to the content (we had to build a temporary shelter for medical purpose in developing areas in our term)
reviews.comment_teaching: Appreciate that the professor tried to make the class more interactive by asking a lot of question
reviews.comment_grading: Not bad. I think the professor was pretty generous about the grade. Final Exam requires a bit more memorization than other course as it is a closed book exam and there are quite of lot of technical terms to rmb and some math to know.
reviews.comment_workload:
Fair, some hw but as long as you hand in, you got full credit
